definitions.text: an occasion (usually brief) for buying at specially reduced prices
examples: they held a sale to reduce their inventory
I got some great bargains at their annual sale

definitions.text: the state of being purchasable; offered or exhibited for selling
examples: you'll find vitamin C for sale at most pharmacies
the new line of cars will soon be on sale

definitions.text: an agreement (or contract) in which property is transferred from the seller (vendor) to the buyer (vendee) for a fixed price in money (paid or agreed to be paid by the buyer)
examples: the salesman faxed the sales agreement to his home office
